title: Understanding DIS
text: Think about the role of DIS in managing and providing access to data. Consider what functions it might perform in a data architecture context.

title: Database Functionality
text: Consider how a database is used in storing and organizing data. What kind of operations can you perform with a database?

title: Service Functionality
text: Think about what a service does in terms of providing data to users or other systems. How does it interact with data?

title: Combining Functions
text: Now, combine the functionalities of a database and a service. What does DIS serve as in this context?
